doc.name: View
doc.description: An event to view the model in the model parameter in a separate window. If the tableau parameter is ignored as the default, a new window is opened for each such event. If the referredTableau parameter is specified with the name of a tableau, then the specified tableau will be used to view the model.
doc.author: Thomas Huining Feng
doc.property: If the isPersistent parameter is false, then the user will not be prompted to save the model upon closing. Models in the test suite might want to have this parameter set to false so as to avoid a dialog asking if the user wants to save the model. The default is a boolean with a value of false, indicating that the user will be not prompted to save the model if the model has changed.
Name of the tableau referred to, or an empty string if the default tableau is to be used.
Whether the window should be closed and reopened on each update.
Location of the new window, or [-1, -1] if the default location is to be used.
Size of the new window, or [-1, -1] if the default size is to be used.
